segments.text: No . Just let me see a doctor . I'm worried about my arm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be brave , sir . It won't be long . I will fill out the form for you . What is your name ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Steve Schliessman . S C H L I E S S M A N .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright Steve . Your social security number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have your insurance card with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you can call it in later . You can phone us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: First I need to get your address . Try to move your arm as little as possible .
segments.speaker: S2
